sentences.sentence: She had no personal or family history of hypertension or hyperthyroidism.
sentences.translation: 她没有高血压和甲亢的个人或家庭病史。

sentences.sentence: Richter said the high number of cases of cancer and hyperthyroidism in pets can be attributed to better diagnosing of the illnesses.
sentences.translation: 里克特说，由于疾病更好地被诊断使得能在宠物发现大量的癌症和甲状腺机能亢进症。
